divs: Sighting DetailsI was waiting for Even to take him to work at the bakery. I was in my car facing west looking at the sunset. It was light out side. Right in my field of vision, there was a sudden appearance of the bright ball streaking down with things breaking off of it and the things went out and the main body just went to the ground. I though it was a crashing plane. It was in front of the setting sun and it was still very bright. The object went down below the horizon.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Deerfield Beach
There were no other sightings in Deerfield Beach on or around June 12th 2012
Summary: bright ball streaking down with pieces breaking off and then blinking out
